title: Mobile roaming charges: Ofcom proposes new rules to curb fees
description: Ofcom says mobile networks would have to tell people when they are going to be charged.

title: Fifa esports final hit by penalty shootout row
description: One of gaming's biggest contests is marred by a row over a penalty shootout in its grand final.

title: Netflix ends password sharing in 'big market' India
description: Only users from a single household will be able to use an account, the streaming giant has said.

title: Elon Musk: Tesla may cut prices again in 'turbulent times'
description: The company reported that its profit margins have been squeezed as it faces tough competition.
